data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Well, I guess that once an organization has merged with another, it instantly gains a new market share that it may not have had before. It creates a source of income for both companies. Customers are also benefited because they can access to new products and services. While mergers can also create distress within the employees, there could be a high chance of layoffs. Many people are forced into high levels of anxiety because they do not know what will happen to them. Besides, employees may find it hard to adapt to a new corporate culture. (97 字)
data.referenceText: What are the advantages and disadvantages when two companies merge?
data.referenceTranslate: 两家公司合并有什么好处和坏处?
